      • getThreshold

        public static java.lang.String getThreshold(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> Y,
                            weka.core.Instances D,
                            java.lang.String top)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        GetThreshold - Get a threshold from a Threshold OPtion string 'top'.
        Parameters:
        Y - label space; for calculating a threshold with PCut
        D - training data; for calculating a threshold with PCut
        top - Threshold OPtion (either "PCut1", "PCutL" or a real value e.g. "0.5" or L real values e.g. "[0.1, 0.2, 0.8]" for L = 3
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getMLStats

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getMLStats(double[][] Rpred,
                                                              int[][] Y,
                                                              java.lang.String t,
                                                              java.lang.String vop)
        GetMLStats - Given predictions and corresponding true values and a threshold string, retreive statistics.
        Parameters:
        Confidences - predictions (may be real-valued confidences)
        TrueValues - corresponding true values
        t - a threshold string, e.g. "0.387"
        Returns:
        the evaluation statistics

      • getMLStats

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getMLStats(double[][] Rpred,
                                                              int[][] Y,
                                                              double[] t,
                                                              java.lang.String vop)
        GetMLStats - Given predictions and corresponding true values and a threshold string, retreive statistics.
        Parameters:
        Confidences - predictions (may be double-valued confidences in the multi-label case)
        TrueValues - corresponding true values
        t - a vector of thresholds, e.g. [0.1,0.1,0.1] or [0.1,0.5,0.4,0.001]
        Returns:
        the evaluation statistics

      • getMTStats

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getMTStats(double[][] Rpred,
                                                              int[][] Y,
                                                              java.lang.String vop)
        GetMTStats - Given multi-target predictions and corresponding true values, retreive evaluation statistics.
        Parameters:
        Predictions - predictions
        TrueValues - corresponding true values
        Returns:
        the evaluation statistics

      • averageResults

        public static Result averageResults(Result[] folds)
        AverageResults - Create a Result with the average of an array of Results by taking the average +/- standand deviation.
        Parameters:
        folds - array of Results (e.g., from CV-validation)
        Returns:
        A result reporting the average of these folds.

        Main - can use this function for writing tests during development.
        Parameters:
